name: Q7 Color Blocks
description:
Match3 puzzle inspired by game on my old mp3 player.

Control - Arrows 

Shift Color - Up

Space - Instant drop

P - Pause

Your goals is gather as many scores as you can and complete all combo-figure shown on the right.  Combos are collected once per session and give a multiplier to the final points. You can complete combo not exactly like it shown, upside down or mirrored counts too. (visual tutorial i will add later). 13  level is the last, if you are comfortable with speed on it, you can play until you get bored xD.
